welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hemel Hempstead, a charming town known for its picturesque old town, beautiful parks, and rich history. We hope you enjoy your time exploring all that this lovely city has to offer!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly European and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The second newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The third newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a 45 minute time limit per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson (RAF Station) Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Benson (RAF Station) Airport serves as a base for the Royal Air Force and is restricted to authorized personnel only.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after watching a short advertisement.
